website_summaries.verdict: If you want a pore minimizer by a top brand that doesn't have oil or fragrance, this is a good pick.
pros: Formulated by a top brand in beauty to smooth skin and reduce pores gently
Oil-free formula doesn't feel heavy on the face, and wears nicely under makeup
cons: May take several weeks of dedicated use to see any results, but many users find it worth the wait

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years, however, this is the first time that I had purchased Clinique Pore Refining Correcting Serum from Amazon & so glad that I did. Not only was the price better, the delivery was fast also. What I like about this serum is that I have very large pores & this truly does minimize them plus it also feels so good on my face. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: N.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Refined my pores
customer_reviews.text: The product came out of the original bottle, but in general the product is working very well for my oily skin, thinning my pores. The smell is great and is easy to apply and spread
customer_reviews.author: Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Satin Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this serum a few years ago and was blown away by the results. It really does instantly smooth my face. I don't like the mess of makeup but I still want to look fresh and naturally perky. This serum isn't gooey or oily and once it has set in (maybe 60 secs), my face feels like satin. I have to make myself not touch it because it feels so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for oily skin, prone to breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Clinique for years. This product definitely makes a difference on the appearance of pores. This is a must have for oily skin, prone to breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and effective
customer_reviews.text: Effective, lightweight enough to use under makeup! Just wish it wasn’t so expensive but Amazon price is the same or less than most department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Darci E

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much smaller my pores look after about one month. I apply it each morning after the Clinique three-step routine.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kelingos

customer_reviews.title: Minimizes pores
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as part of my daily skin care routine, following washing to moisturize and minimize my pores. This is a product that works! It ultimately will leave your skin with pores almost invisible to the eye and softer than ever. This is definitely one of my favorite products by Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin feel smooth.
customer_reviews.text: This product makes your skin feel very smooth. Goes on easy. Can't say that my pores looked any smaller which is why I bought it. On the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This is a magic product I have used for years. Love getting on amazon. Definite noticeable reduction in size and appearance of pores. Super smooth under makeup b
customer_reviews.author: Fiddle-dee-dee

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! Pores literally disappear and gives the skin a smooth youthful appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Twintastic

customer_reviews.title: This really does work but consistency is key!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got pretty large pores on my cheeks from wearing makeup and acne over the years. I’ve been using this for a little over two weeks and I do see a drastic difference in pore size, texture and tone. Will definitely continue to use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for only a few days and already see a huge difference! You only need a tiny bit and I only use it where I have yucky pores and it's been amazing! I love Clinique, their products always work for me!
customer_reviews.author: ESK

customer_reviews.title: It lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my face and have been using clinque products since my 20's . I am in my 60's now but you can't tell. The skin on my face looks younger than my age. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product-really does help to minimize the look of my pores especially around my nose area.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: It does not work as advertised. Save your money and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same product from clinique.com and the texture was different than this one. This is thicker as if vasline was added while the original one was lighter. I used this until the bottle finished and did not see result but I see results faster from clinque original one.
customer_reviews.author: I-M

customer_reviews.title: silky
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday and it feels like silk on my skin. I noticed a difference in my skin right away. It shipped and was delivered quickly. I highly recommend this product for any age.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cromartie

customer_reviews.title: silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. I haven't used it enought to see a change in the pore size but it does leave my skin silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wirks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic for me, Im only hace 1 week with the product and I can see positive changes in my face!
customer_reviews.author: Manzanita

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it four stars because it is a bit pricey. There are other products in the market that don't cost as much.
customer_reviews.author: Elena M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Feels like silk
customer_reviews.text: I had a skin reaction a week ago. I started using this to help resolve the issue and my skin texture greatly improved within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Have tried others
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have tried others, and this is the only one that works and doesn't leave residue. Have been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful. I’ve used it for over a month, and it made my pores smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well for people with large pore issues. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: katherine barton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product absolutely works as intended. I am 26 and HAD unsightly pores on my nose and a few permanently clogged pores on my cheeks. These were all cleared out and ABSOLUTELY smaller with in 24 hours. I used the product with Este Lauder's Perfectly Clean Splash Away Foaming Cleanser. There is no chemical reaction between the two! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Orvis

customer_reviews.title: It is a goog product
customer_reviews.text: It my first time to use it, and it is cheaper than china, it is a goog gift for Chinese friend
customer_reviews.author: Zixuan Zhang

customer_reviews.title: works great, give it time.
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the biggest blackheads I'd ever seen. I'm not kidding, I'm Italian and oilier than you can imagine. At age 37 my blackheads were so huge I was embarrassed to even kiss anyone as that would mean they'd be up close and personal with my gross pores. I was taught to apply this serum in downward strokes. Upward strokes make your pores stand up just the way upward strokes make your hairs stand up. Use a teeny tiny bit, just half a pump is plenty. It took 3 weeks to work for me but I finally look like a normal person. You can get free samples at Sephora so you can try it out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while and have noticed no change. Maybe I got a bad batch, but for the price there shouldn't be such a thing as a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Pores? What pores?
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not concern myself too much with my pores, because let's face it, women have enough skin issues to worry about as it is. However, I love Clinique products, and I recently received a free sample of this serum. I was amazed at the results. As soon as I applied it, I noticed a major different in my complexion, in that it appeared to be practically poreless! Unbelievable. The price is a bit steep for a 1 oz. bottle, and I am not sure I will repurchase just for that reason, but the product itself is awesome and it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this religiously for about 4 weeks now, morning and night. I have large pores on my cheeks, forehead and nose (t zone) and I am in my mid 30's (these just popped up unfortunately-probably from decades of wearing makeup). I have been using a clay mask to clean out the pores regularly along with this product. My pores do not appear any smaller. I wish there was a product out there that actually works. If anyone knows one, please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Heather
